title: You get what you pay for
text: Yes this place is incredibly cheap, but then you actually have to stay here.The room and particularly the bath were very small. Towels were tiny and rough to the touch. We had booked this to avoid driving an hour home after a late night event and ended up deciding to drive home anyway. Location is pretty good - very close to the Marina and Cow Hollow, but don't expect anything more than a safe place to crash. Make lots of plans to be out of your room if you decide to stay here. Good news is you'll have plenty of cash left over. :)
